mapper.insert: insert into users( id, sei, mei, mailaddress, password, selfIntro, createdAt, updatedAt, isDeleted ) values( #{id}, #{sei}, #{mei}, #{mailaddress}, #{password}, #{selfIntro}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, false )
mapper.update: update users set sei = #{sei}, mei = #{mei}, mailaddress = #{mailaddress}, password = #{password}, selfIntro = #{selfIntro}, updatedAt = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
